description: Assigns the Play Store (com.android.vending) as installation source to installing apps. Does not support Android App Bundle (splits).
subtitle: Old version.
title: Native

subtitle: Allows installation in the background without prompting for installation.
title: ROOT

description: Requires Aurora Services (com.aurora.services) to be installed as system-privileged app (/system/priv-app/).
subtitle: Same benefits as the ROOT-installer.
title: Aurora Service

description: Requires App Manager (io.github.muntashirakon.AppManager). Need ADB/ROOT mode to install when MIUI optimization is ON.
subtitle: Submits installation files to App Manager for installation on its behalf.
title: App Manager
